info.name: Chrome New Tab
info.description:
New Tab styles no longer work.

Chrome v61 disabled content script injection on the New Tab page. RIP.

https://codereview.chromium.org/2978953002/
I'm working on a workaround.



A simple, minimalistic new tab page for Chrome. Makes some minimal stylistic changes to Chrome's default new tab page. I plan to create a tampermonkey script or chrome extension eventually that adds extra functionality such as a dynamic background, time, weather, and more.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.2a: Smoothed management bar init animation, added backgrounds to notifications.
v0.3a: Fixed background not occupying full page space.
